name: Chemistry
description: Simple entity with alloy and particle compositions.

properties.name: alloy
properties.description: A human description of the alloying system and temper.

properties.name: elements
properties.description: Chemical symbol of each chemical element.  By convension the dependent element (e.g. Al) is listed first.

properties.name: X0
properties.description: Nominal composition.  Should sum to one.

properties.name: Xp
properties.description: Average composition of each phase, excluding matrix.  Each row should sum to one.

properties.name: volfrac
properties.description: Volume fraction of each phase, excluding matrix.

properties.name: rpart
properties.description: Average particle radius of each phase, excluding matrix.

properties.name: atvol
properties.description: Average volume per atom for each phase.
